testCaseBlueprint.name: Industry4_0_Spain_TCB
testCaseBlueprint.configurationScript: EXECUTE_COMMAND vnf.326619c2-a70f-4373-b2ec-696c69eecc33.extcp.eth0.ipaddress $$userB:$$passwordB sudo dhclient ens5 && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install bridge-utils && sudo ip addr flush dev ens4 && sudo ip addr flush dev ens5 && sudo brctl addbr br0 && sudo brctl addif br0 ens4 ens5 && sudo ip link set dev br0 up;
testCaseBlueprint.resetConfigScript: EXECUTE_COMMAND vnf.326619c2-a70f-4373-b2ec-696c69eecc33.extcp.eth0.ipaddress $$userB:$$passwordB sudo /bin/bash /home/test/probe/stopProbe.sh vnf.326619c2-a70f-4373-b2ec-696c69eecc33.extcp.eth1.ipaddress && sudo tc qdisc del dev ens4 root;
testCaseBlueprint.executionScript: EXECUTE_COMMAND vnf.326619c2-a70f-4373-b2ec-696c69eecc33.extcp.eth0.ipaddress $$userB:$$passwordB sudo tc qdisc add dev ens4 root netem delay 10ms 5ms 25% && sudo /bin/bash /home/test/probe/executeProbe.sh vnf.326619c2-a70f-4373-b2ec-696c69eecc33.extcp.eth1.ipaddress;
